title: The Triple Fool - the "man" is motivated by

content.question: According to the speaker, the “man” in line 13 is motivated chiefly by

choices.label: the desire to display his own talents
plans to woo the speaker's mistress

content.answer: the desire to display his own talents

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
